meanings.definition: Situated below all others in position.
meanings.sent1: The lowermost shelf held the heaviest books.
meanings.sent2: The basement is the lowermost level of the house.
meanings.sent3: The lowermost step seemed to be playing hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the lowermost layer of her personality.
meanings.sent5: The lowermost part of the mountain was shrouded in mist.

meanings.definition: The lowest in order or rank.
meanings.sent1: He was always at the lowermost of the class rankings.
meanings.sent2: The lowermost in the hierarchy often feel overlooked.
meanings.sent3: The lowermost in the pack had a mischievous glint in his eye.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of ants, the lowermost worker toiled tirelessly.
meanings.sent5: The lowermost of the team was determined to prove their worth.
